agentic-ai-with-cyoda.md.title: Building Agentic AI Applications with Cyoda Online Platform
agentic-ai-with-cyoda.md.author: Patrick Stanton
agentic-ai-with-cyoda.md.excerpt: Cyoda's online platform enables developers to create agentic AI applications faster, safer, and with greater reliability. By combining entity-centric design, workflows, and transactional consistency, Cyoda provides a powerful alternative to traditional AI development stacks.

asynchronous-workflow-automation.md.title: Asynchronous Workflow Automation: State Machines as First-Class Citizens
asynchronous-workflow-automation.md.author: Cyoda Team
asynchronous-workflow-automation.md.excerpt: This document compares the Cyoda Service Platform with a range of tools for workflow orchestration, data integration, cloud-native services, and AI-assisted development.

beyond-traditional-databases.md.title: Beyond Traditional Databases: Why Entity-Centric Architecture Matters
beyond-traditional-databases.md.author: Paul Schleger
beyond-traditional-databases.md.excerpt: Modern applications demand more than traditional databases can deliver. Discover how Entity-Centric Architecture and Cyoda's EDBMS addresses the gaps in relational and document databases for stateful, process-driven applications.

designing-for-high-availability.md.title: Designing for High-Availability in Distributed Systems: Lessons from Cyoda
designing-for-high-availability.md.author: Patrick Stanton
designing-for-high-availability.md.excerpt: Distributed systems power the modern enterprise, but with scale comes complexity. Learn how Cyoda's platform combines Cassandra, Zookeeper, and event-context sharding to deliver fault tolerance at scale.

distributed-reporting-without-data-lakes.title: Distributed Reporting Without Data Lakes
distributed-reporting-without-data-lakes.author: Cyoda Team
distributed-reporting-without-data-lakes.excerpt: For many enterprises, reporting requires extracting data into separate lakes or warehouses. Cyoda takes a different approach by embedding distributed reporting directly into the transactional platform for real-time insights without ETL overhead.

event-context-sharding.md.title: Event-Context Sharding vs. Traditional Sharding
event-context-sharding.md.author: Paul Schleger
event-context-sharding.md.excerpt: Distributed systems live and die by how they manage concurrency. Discover how Cyoda's event-context sharding approach aligns sharding with business entities to avoid conflicts and complexity in event-driven workflows.

from-banking-systems-to-saas.md.title: From Banking Systems to SaaS: Why Cyoda Exists
from-banking-systems-to-saas.md.author: Patrick Stanton
from-banking-systems-to-saas.md.excerpt: The modern enterprise landscape is defined by complexity, scale, and constant change. Discover how Cyoda was born from lessons learned in high-stakes investment banking back-office systems and why it matters for mission-critical applications.

querying-the-past.md.title: Querying the Past: Point-in-Time Data Access at Scale
querying-the-past.md.author: Cyoda Team
querying-the-past.md.excerpt: In an era where data-driven decisions are critical, the ability to query the past is more than convenienceâ€”it's necessity. Learn how Cyoda's consistency clock and snapshot isolation enable point-in-time queries at scale.

the-future-of-cyoda-cloud.md.title: The Future of Cyoda: Cloud-Native Entity Databases
the-future-of-cyoda-cloud.md.author: Patrick Stanton
the-future-of-cyoda-cloud.md.excerpt: Enterprises are shifting from on-premise, code-heavy platforms to cloud-native, configuration-driven systems. Discover how Cyoda Cloud reimagines mission-critical systems with a fully managed Entity Database Management System.

when-transactions-meet-workflows.md.title: When Transactions Meet Workflows: Building Reliable Systems Without Glue Code
when-transactions-meet-workflows.md.author: Paul Schleger
when-transactions-meet-workflows.md.excerpt: Most enterprises build reliable systems by stitching together PostgreSQL, Kafka, and workflow engines. Cyoda offers a different vision: a unified platform where transactions, workflows, and queries reduce complexity while improving reliability.
